data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
What few game-related modules there are, are all grouped together
    under Games; so be it. I then had a choice to either create a
    Traveller namespace, or RPG::Traveller; I chose the former so I
    wouldn't have to type as much. So the namespace I would prefer is
    Games::Traveller::UWP, though I am open to suggestions.

    An alternate namespace would be Games::TAS:UWP, where 'TAS' is a
    very common acronym in the Traveller RPG ( 'Travellers' Aid Society'
    ) and is somewhat relevant to Perl modules submitted on behalf of
    Traveller. But it's a bit less clear than just plain Traveller. So
    that's where I'm at.
